about_the_game:
A Brief Story...

You take the role of Liam, a young boy who one day woke to find everyone around him gone. And so, he sets off on an adventure to find those around him; before discovering the dastardly plans of the one who started it all.

Can You Save Everyone?

Game Modes + Content

Play through over 20 levels in the main story, along with extra side content in other modes such as a local multiplayer versus mode; and even more content planned for after launch!

From a vast series of fields to a treacherous factory, and many other environments in between; you'll be kept on your toes through many twists along the way. Almost every single level has its own new feature, adding up to create a robust set of movement options such as...

Movement Options

Liam has a vast array of movement options available at his disposable, that slowly become available as the game progresses! These include, but aren't limited to: sprinting, sliding, a high jump and gravity that will change as you progress!
